dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Most of the wording for the infringing
app's description were copied from previous versions of our Pimple Popper's
description, but this paragraph is most flagrant and copied verbatim (as
you can see from our current app description):
Pimple Popper! Keep life simple and pop a pimple! Cant sleep? Bored?
Stressed? Well, a few minutes with our Pimple Popper app and youll feel
better! The #1 Pimple Game on the iOS is now available on Android!
Experience what all the pus...er, fuss is all about. Once you pop, you cant
stop! Sure its nasty, but also strangely addicting! For Android OS 2.0 and
up.
